page.title: 01Birdham - General Review
page.content: { {Birdham}is a village 5 miles south of Chichester, the county town of West Sussex. The village is in a designated area of outstanding natural beauty.The population is approximately 1300. It is built mainly around 3 roads which form a triangle. The major road is the{A286}known as the Birdham Straight. At the south end the road divides and runs to East and West Wittering. The village fronts the Chichester Channel of{Chichester Harbour,}very popular with water sporstmen. To the West of the village of Birdham is the hamlet of{Shipton Green}which runs into the village of West Itchenor. Across the Chichester Channel is {Bosham Hoe,}a residential estate.
